item.title: Daf XF Euro 6 by Leo Gamer 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 12, 2025

Daf XF Euro 6 by Leo Gamer 1.55 ETS2

The DAF XF Euro 6 is a significant step forward in the evolution of DAF’s flagship long-haul truck. Introduced to meet stricter European emissions standards, it brought major changes not only to its engine but also to its design, safety, and driver comfort.

Engine and Efficiency
The heart of the DAF XF Euro 6 is its PACCAR MX-11 and MX-13 engines. These engines were developed to be more efficient and cleaner than their Euro 5 predecessors. Key features include:

Euro 6 Compliance: This is achieved through a combination of technologies, including Selective Catalytic Reduction (SCR), Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR), and a Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF). This system drastically reduces harmful emissions like nitrogen oxides (NOx) and particulate matter.
Fuel Economy: The new engines, along with improved aerodynamics and the ZF Traxon automated gearbox, are designed to reduce fuel consumption. Features like EcoRoll and Predictive Cruise Control further assist in optimizing fuel efficiency.
Engine Brake: The PACCAR MX Engine Brake offers powerful, three-stage braking, which helps reduce wear on the foundation brakes and improves safety on descents.

Cabin and Driver Comfort
DAF is well-known for prioritizing driver comfort, and the Euro 6 XF is no exception. The cab was redesigned to be more spacious and ergonomic.

Cabs: It comes with a choice of Space Cab and the famously large Super Space Cab. Both offer a lot of interior space, including a flat floor in the Super Space Cab, which makes moving around the cabin much easier.
Interior: The dashboard is a well-thought-out, wraparound design with a new digital display. There’s a lot of storage space, and the seats are highly adjustable, with options for heating and ventilation. The cab is also exceptionally quiet, which helps reduce driver fatigue.

Safety and Technology
Safety is a major focus for the XF Euro 6, with many features that have become standard for modern trucks.

Active Safety Systems: The truck is equipped with a suite of safety features, including Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC), a Forward Collision Warning (FCW), and an Advanced Emergency Braking System (AEBS).
Vehicle Stability Control (VSC): This system works to prevent jack-knifing and rollovers by electronically managing the truck’s braking and throttle.
Driver Assistance: The Driver Performance Assistant (DPA) provides real-time feedback to help the driver operate the truck more economically and safely. This includes tips on braking, gear selection, and even tire pressure.

Credits: leo game

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Fuso Horário By Matuto 3D v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 12, 2025

Fuso Horário By Matuto 3D v1.0 ETS2

The request “Fuso Horário By Matuto 3D” is a specific reference to a well-known mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). It combines a mod’s name, “Fuso Horário” (which means “Time Zone” in Portuguese), with the creator’s name, Matuto 3D.

This mod is not about adding a new truck or bus but about a significant gameplay change related to time and the in-game economy.

What is the Fuso Horário Mod?
The Fuso Horário mod by Matuto 3D changes the way time works in the game, specifically for players who use mods that add new regions or maps, especially those that include Brazil.

By default, ETS2 uses a single time zone for its entire map (Europe). However, Brazil, with its vast territory, has multiple time zones. This mod’s purpose is to address that discrepancy, making the game more realistic for players using Brazilian map mods.

Key Features of the Mod
Real-World Time Zones: The primary function of the mod is to simulate different time zones. As you drive across different parts of the Brazilian map, the in-game clock will adjust, just as it would in real life. This affects things like day-night cycles and the time of day when you arrive at your destination.
Gameplay Impact: The mod adds a layer of realism and challenge. You’ll need to pay closer attention to your delivery times, as a long trip across multiple time zones could mean a later arrival than the in-game clock initially suggests.
Map Mod Compatibility: This mod is designed to work in conjunction with popular Brazilian map mods for ETS2, such as EAA, Rotas Brasil, and others. It’s a key part of the experience for players who want to immerse themselves in a realistic Brazilian setting.

In short, “Fuso Horário By Matuto 3D” is a mod that enhances the realism of ETS2 by introducing time zone changes to a single-player environment, making the game more accurate for players using large-scale map mods.

Credits: matuto 3d

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
